statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT timestamp, sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_type, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' AND sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'humidity' ORDER BY sensor_value ASC
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING total_count > 100
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31' ORDER BY sensor_type DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(sensor_value) AS average_value, sensor_type FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type ORDER BY average_value DESC
SELECT * FROM motion_detection;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM motion_detection WHERE motion_detected = TRUE;
SELECT id, sensor_id, timestamp FROM door_window_status ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(id) AS motion_count FROM motion_detection GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM door_window_status WHERE door_status = TRUE AND window_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM motion_detection WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND motion_detected = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, sensor_id, timestamp FROM door_window_status WHERE door_status = TRUE AND window_status = FALSE ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS motion_count FROM motion_detection GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY motion_count DESC
SELECT id, sensor_id, timestamp FROM door_window_status WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 20
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(CAST(motion_detected AS INT)) AS motion_avg FROM motion_detection GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5 ORDER BY motion_avg DESC
SELECT * FROM MotionDetection WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM DoorStatus WHERE door_status = 'OPEN';
SELECT id, timestamp, door_status FROM DoorStatus WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER by id ASC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) FROM WindowStatus GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM MotionDetection WHERE motion_detected = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM MotionDetection WHERE motion_detected = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM DoorStatus WHERE door_status = 'CLOSED' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, device_id, timestamp FROM WindowStatus WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND window_status = 'OPEN' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS motion_count FROM MotionDetection GROUP BY device_id HAVING motion_count >= 5 ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM DoorStatus INNER JOIN WindowStatus ON DoorStatus.device_id = WindowStatus.device_id ORDER BY DoorStatus.timestamp DESC, WindowStatus.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM motion_detection ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, motion_detected FROM motion_detection WHERE motion_detected = TRUE;
SELECT location FROM sensor_location WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT sensor_id, door_opened FROM door_status WHERE door_opened = FALSE ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, window_opened, timestamp FROM window_status WHERE sensor_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM motion_detection WHERE motion_detected = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM door_status WHERE door_opened = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensor_location WHERE sensor_id < 5 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT * FROM window_status WHERE window_opened = FALSE ORDER BY sensor_id DESC
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, location FROM sensor_location JOIN door_status USING (sensor_id) WHERE door_opened = TRUE
SELECT * FROM sensor_info
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensor_info
SELECT id, location FROM sensor_info
SELECT * FROM sensor_activity_log WHERE activity = 'Motion Detected'
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM door_status LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM sensor_info
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensor_info ORDER BY sensor_name DESC
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensor_info WHERE sensor_type = 'motion'
SELECT id, timestamp FROM motion_detection WHERE motion_detected = TRUE
SELECT sensor_id, activity FROM sensor_activity_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
